hero.description: Streamline appointment scheduling, reduce no-shows, go paperless, get positive online reviews, and much more. The best part is it just takes 15 minutes to integrate PracticeDilly with Eaglesoft.

stat.label: Minutes to Full Integration
stat.description: We understand how busy you are! Give us just 15 minutes to integrate with Eaglesoft and then enjoy all the benefits.

heading.text: How PracticeDilly can help simplify patient engagement in everyday operations?

features.description: PracticeDilly application seamlessly integrating with Eaglesoft and providing extra benefits like Appointment reminders, Two-way texting, Online Reviews, Campaigns & Promotions, Paperless Forms.

items.title: Appointment Reminders
items.description: Automatically send out personalized reminders to your patients via email, text, or phone calls. Confirmations received from patients are recorded in the Eaglesoft schedule.

items.title: Two-Way Texting
items.description: With PracticeDilly you can search patients in Eaglesoft Family File and send them text messages. Patients can also text you pictures of their ID and Insurance cards.

items.title: Online Scheduling
items.description: Allow patients to book appointments online at their convenience. Booked appointments are automatically added to your Eaglesoft schedule.

items.title: Paperless Forms
items.description: You can easily send out intake forms via text message or email to any patient on your Eaglesoft schedule. We will customize your current forms at no extra cost to you.

items.title: Text to Pay
items.description: Take advantage of our software to send payment requests via text/email to your patients on the Eaglesoft family file and get the amount credited to your bank account quickly and efficiently.

items.title: Campaigns & Promotions
items.description: Automatically send birthday greetings, and re-call reminders to patients on the Eaglesoft family file. You can also send out any promotional, and urgent messages to all patients using the mass texting feature.

items.title: Online Reviews
items.description: Have your happy patients leave a positive review on Google, Yelp, or Facebook. You can have PracticeDilly send out review requests automatically to patients on your Eaglesoft schedule post-appointment. Alternatively, you can decide which patients to ask for reviews from.

items.title: Mobile App
items.description: View your Eaglesoft schedule, message your patients and manage your practice from PracticeDilly's all-in-one dental mobile app.

items.title: 15 MINS
items.description: We understand how busy you are! Give us just 15 minutes to integrate with Eaglesoft and then enjoy all the benefits.

items.title: Great Support
items.description: We even have our support staff providing you with assistance after hours or during the weekend.

items.title: Fair Pricing
items.description: We provide highly affordable pricing plans designed to assist you in growing your dental practice.
